page.title: 20Children at play, Alcester
page.content: In Alcester there are many interesting things for children to do. There is a sports hall where the roller disco, badminton, judo and many other things happen. Ballet and tap dancing are held in other halls. There are a lot of clubs like Brownies, Cubs, Rangers and Red Cross where you have to wear uniform. In school there are clubs too, like gym club and music groups. Many children enjoy the Youth Club at the Greig Hall. The countryside is very beautiful and children enjoy walks, picnics, angling and horse riding. At Ragley Hall there is an enormous adventure playground with a maze. There are special events too. There are fetes and a gigantic fair called the Mop. There is a Medieval Market, a Pancake Race and fun runs to raise money for charity.
